hotels.title: Regal Cochin City Stay with Five Onsite Restaurants and Bars
hotels.description: In Cochin's rich city centre you will find merchant-lined ports, remnants of colonial heritage and the elegant Holiday Inn Cochin, an IHG Hotel, positioned to take in sweeping city views and laced with grand entrances and pampering amenities. Here, there is no shortage of divine cuisine, with multiple onsite restaurants and bars to whet any appetite. If relaxation is on your itinerary, spend a day lounging on the rooftop and take a dip in the glistening pool or melt away under the experienced hands of a world-class wellness therapist at the Senses & Elements spa.
